section.p: Insert External Entity Dialog allows insertion of either previously declared entities or XML entities that are not yet declared in the edited document.
To insert a declared external entity simply click on the entity that you wish to insert and click OK.
If the XML entity you wish to insert is not yet declared in the edited file, then:

li.p: Click the Insert From File radio-button.
Type the new entity name in the Entity Name text box.
And type (or browse with the Browse... button) the filename of the entity.

section.p: If the entity is parsed OK it will be automatically declared and inserted into the current position of the document.
